name: International Chamber of Commerce in Belgium
membership: - INTERNATIONAL CHAMBER OF COMMERCE (ICC), THE WORLD BUSINESS ORGANIZATION
goal:
ICC Belgium is a national committee of the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC). These national bodies comprise leading companies and business associations in their countries or territories. National committees shape ICC policies and alert their governments to international business concerns.
ICC is – and has been throughout its long existence – a steadfast rallying point for those who believe, like our founders, that strengthening commercial ties among nations is not only good for business but good for global living standards and good for peace.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU trade agenda;
- Union Customs Code (UCC);
- EU Sustainable Development Strategy;
- EU Cybersecurity Strategy;
- Bank Recovery and Resolution Directive;
- Anti Tax Avoidance Package;
- Enforcement of intellectual property rights and fight against counterfeiting and piracy;
- Anti-corruption policy at EU level;
- Competition Law.
